TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit ListSourceHelper extends System.Object
public ref class ListSourceHelper abstract sealed

summary.span: 在实现由 接口定义的成员时，由数据源控件使用。

span.span: Used by data source controls when implementing the members defined by the interface.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类是一个实用工具类，它提供用于 通过数据源控件简化接口的实现。The class is a utility class provided to simplify implementation of the interface by data source controls. 实现 接口但不扩展类的数据源控件 可以 在其自身的实现中使用该接口所定义的方法的静态方法 。Data source controls that implement the interface but do not extend the class can use the static methods in their own implementations of the methods defined by the interface. 从类扩展的数据源控件 会自动继承这些方法实现。Data source controls that extend from the class inherit these method implementations automatically. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了实现方法的数据源类的设计模式 。The following code example demonstrates the design pattern for a data source class that implements the methods. [!code-csharp[Samples.AspNet.Controls.IListSourceHelper#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Samples.AspNet.Controls.IListSourceHelper/CS/somedatasource.cs#2)] [!code-vb[Samples.AspNet.Controls.IListSourceHelper#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Samples.AspNet.Controls.IListSourceHelper/VB/somedatasource.vb#2)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在方法的实现中使用此方法 ，将引用传递到数据源控件。Use this method in an implementation of the method, passing a reference to a data source control. 返回的对象实现 接口。The object that is returned implements the interface. 您可以使用 方法来检索 与列表中的数据源控件关联的名称对应的描述符列表。You can use the method to retrieve a list of descriptors that correspond to the names associated with the data source control from the list. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了实现方法的数据源类的设计模式 。The following code example demonstrates the design pattern for a data source class that implements the methods. 方法调用静态 方法。The method calls the static method.
